entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2°C

Observed at: Saturna Island 06:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening then southeast 20 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
